DOC.brief_summary: This study determine safety , tolerability , Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Pharmacodynamics ( PD ) ASP1941 single oral dose ( Part A ) . In addition , investigate whether intake food effect PK ASP1941 ( Part B ) .
DOC.brief_title: First Men Study Single Oral Doses ASP1941 Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist two part . Part A double-blind , placebo control single dose escalation study evaluate safety tolerability single ascending dos ASP1941 . Part B open label , crossover design food-effect study evaluate effect feed condition PK ASP1941 .
DOC.criteria: Body weight 60100 kg , body mass index ( BMI ) 2030 kg/m2 , inclusive Fasting Plasma Glucose ( FPG ) > 6.4 mmol/l HbA1c > 6.2 % Pulse < 40 > 90 beat per minute ; Systolic Blood Pressure ( SBP ) < 90 > 140 mmHg ; Diastolic Blood Pressure ( DBP ) < 40 > 95mmHg
